events.message: I received my new headphones yesterday, but the right ear cup is broken and doesn't work properly at all.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect related to damage on the right ear cup.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Jessica Thompson for further assistance.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your headphones arrived broken. I’ll help you get this sorted out.
Could you please provide a photo showing the damage to the right ear cup as well as your order number?
Here is the photo of the damaged ear cup and my order number is #4578123. Please let me know what to do next.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a replacement pair at no extra cost immediately and provide a prepaid label for the defective item return.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the replacement.
The replacement order has been processed and the return label emailed to you. We consider this issue resolved now.
Just checking in to confirm you received your replacement headphones and that everything is working perfectly.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
